properties.markdownProperty:
Profiles included in the distributed application may have description and translation. Check `profiles.yaml` file in the `resources/i18n/[your desired language]` directory or simply add it to any YAML file inside the application languages directories.
* Translate the profile name following the convention `profile.{profile_name}`. Where `{profile_name}` is the name of the profile folder lowercased and replacing spaces using underscores. * Include translated description using `profiles.description.{profile_name}`.
Example from `profiles.yaml`: ``` yaml profiles.ir: "Requirements Engineering subject (IR)" profiles.description.ir: "Profile for Requirements Engineering (IR) subject at University of Seville" ```
